thread.title: Disney Film To Feature First Gay Character
thread.title_full: Disney Film To Feature First Gay Character

author: CBS Philly
title: Disney Film To Feature First Gay Character
text:
Disney Film To Feature First Gay Character March 2, 2017 12:56 PM (Photo by Jeff Spicer/Getty Images) 
PHILADELPHIA (CBS) — The highly-anticipated live action film “Beauty and the Beast” is breaking ground. 
The film’s director says it will feature Disney’s first ever gay character. 
Bill Condon told Attitude Magazine that “Le Fou,” played by actor Josh Gad, has a subplot about his sexuality. 
Le Fou is Gaston’s sidekick in the film. 
The classic fairytale hits theaters March 17.
